results.title: Effects of short-term metformin therapy associated with levothyroxine dose decrement on TSH and thyroid hormone levels in patients with thyroid cancer.
results.text_hl: Delta TSH was 3.0+-5.6 mIU/L and 3.1+-4.7 mIU/L in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and placebo groups, respectively (P=0.9).

citations.NLM: Mousavi Z, Dourandish L, Rokni H, Sadeghi R, Rasoul Zakavi S. Effects of short-term metformin therapy associated with levothyroxine dose decrement on TSH and thyroid hormone levels in patients with thyroid cancer. Minerva Endocrinol. 2014 Mar;39(1):59-65. PMID: 24513605
citations.BibTeX: @article{24513605, title={Effects of short-term metformin therapy associated with levothyroxine dose decrement on TSH and thyroid hormone levels in patients with thyroid cancer.}, author={Mousavi Z and Dourandish L and Rokni H and Sadeghi R and Rasoul Zakavi S}, journal={Minerva Endocrinol}, volume={39}, number={1}, pages={59-65}}

results.title: Metformin can block precancerous progression to invasive tumors of bladder through inhibiting STAT3-mediated signaling pathways
results.text_hl: Upon treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Methylnitrosourea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008770 @@@MNU@@@-induced @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were only detected with @DISEASE_Retinal_Dysplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D015792 @@@dysplasia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Papillary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002291 @@@papillary tumors@@@ and @DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@CIS@@@.

citations.NLM: Pan Q, Yang GL, Yang JH, Lin SL, Liu N, Liu SS, Liu MY, Zhang LH, Huang YR, Shen RL, Liu Q, Gao JX, Bo JJ. Metformin can block precancerous progression to invasive tumors of bladder through inhibiting STAT3-mediated signaling pathways J Exp Clin Cancer Res. 2015 Aug 7;34(1):77. PMID: 26245871
